Articles.Content: I believe one of mods I've installed may have increased the games render distance. This is causing me some physics and memory issues, but I'd rather not have to uninstall any mods. Is there a way for me to manually reduce the render distance for objects?
when at the space center, on the top Left of the screen is a menu, set distance to default (2.5k)
Some of Romfarer's mods increase the size of the physics sphere, I don't know if they touch the render distance but that would be my first suspicion.
Ah. I assumed render distance and physics sphere were the same thing. If anyone does know how to reduce the physics sphere without getting rid of romfarers (awesome) mods, please let me know.

Pierce, I answered your question. the first post after your OP.

when at the space center, on the top Left of the screen is a menu, set distance to default (2.5k)

if you don't see that, ... UPDATE your mod.
Oh I see. I didn't realize it was a part of the mod. I'll get it updated. Thank you.
And now that I've had time to test it, that's exactly what I needed. Thank you very much.
